metadata.title: CVE-2021-39928 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low
metadata.description:
NULL pointer exception in the IEEE 802.11 dissector in Wireshark 3.4.0 to3.4.9 and 3.2.0 to 3.2.17 allows denial of service via packet injection orcrafted capture file

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-39928` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 3.6.7-1
libwireshark15 - 3.6.7-1
libwiretap12 - 3.6.7-1
libwsutil13 - 3.6.7-1
tshark - 3.6.7-1
wireshark - 3.6.7-1
wireshark-common - 3.6.7-1
wireshark-gtk - 3.6.7-1
wireshark-qt - 3.6.7-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wireshark package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.6.7-1').
